May not drop bomb and Flat Out the same turn.; Table:; 2: No bomb is dropped. The Blitza-bommer is Wrecked; 3-4: No bomb is dropped. The Blitza-bommer and its target suffer a single S:9 AP:2 hit.; 5-9 Centre the small blast marker over any model in the target unit and scatter it D6&quot. Any model (excluding Blitza-bommer) at least partially under the blast marker's final position takes one hit with the profile above; 10-12: The Blitza-bommer not only drops the bmob on the target (See 5-9) but also makes an out-ofsequence shooting attack with its supa shootas. Any unit that suffers unsaved Wounds must immediately take a Pinning test.

In addition, the unit may not fire any weapons in the Shooring phase, though it may still run.
descriptions.name: Instinctive Behaviour - Feed

descriptions.name: Blind Rampage

descriptions.description: A single Hive Tyrant (including the Swarmlord) may join a unit of Tyrant Guard exactly as if it were an independent character and, while part of the unit is treated as such for the purposeso f Look Out Sir! rolls, Challenges, Precision Shots and Precision Strikes. If a Hive Tyrant (or the Swarmlord) has joined a unit of Tyrant Guard, the unit cannot go to ground, boluntarily or otherwise

descriptions.description: Close combat attacks are rending

descriptions.description: All units of Termagants, spawned or otherwise, within 6&quot of a Tervigon can use the Tervigon's Leadership for any tests the are required to make. The also gain the benefits of the Tervigon's toxin sacs and adrenal glands (if it has any). In addition, all Termagant units within 6&quot of the Tervigon have the Counter Attack special rule.; Should the Tervigon be slain, every Termagant brood within 6&quot immediately suffers 3D6 St3 Ap- hits.
descriptions.name: Brood Progenitor

descriptions.description: A Tervigon can spawn Termagants in the Tyranid Movement phase before it has moved - even if is locked in assault. If it does so, roll 3D6. Place a new unit of Termagaunts such that no model is more than 6&quot from the Tervigon - the suze of the unit is equal to the total rolled. Models in this new unit cannot be placed in impassable terrain, or within 1&quot of enemy models. Models that cannot be placed are destroyed. The spawned unit may then move, shoot and assault normally. A unit spawned by a Tervigon is identical in every way to a Termagant unit chosen from the Troops section of the force organisation chart, and is treated as such for all scenarior special rules. Models in a spawned unit havo no biomorphs and always carry Fleshborer.; ; If any double is rolled when determining the size of a spawned unit, the Tervigon may not attempt to spawn further units for the rest of the game
descriptions.name: Spawn Termagants

If a model suffers one or more unsaved wounds in close combat from a Tyranid with a bonesword, it must immediately pass a Leadership test or suffer instant death. If the Tyranid creature that inflicted the wound is armed with Pair Of Boneswords then the Leadership test must instead be passed on 3D6

If a model suffers one or more unsaved wounds in close combat from a Tyranid with a bonesword, it must immediately pass a Leadership test or suffer instant death. If the Tyranid creature that inflicted the wound is armed with Pair Of Boneswords then the Leadership test must instead be passed on 3D6

At the end of the Assault phase place a Ripper Swarm unit with a number of bases equal to the sum total of all of the dice rolled such that all bases are within 6&quot of the Parasite of Mortrex. Any bases that cannot be placed due to impassible terrain, enemy within 1&quot or because you have run out of models, are lost.
descriptions.name: Implant Parasite

descriptions.description: Every enemy infantry unit that arrives using the outflank ability may harbour a squad member infested with Ripper parasites. At the end of theis movement phase, one model in each of these units (owning player's choise) must take a Toughness test. If the test is failed that model is instantly removed as casualty and the Tyranid player may place a Ripper Swarm unit consisting of D6 bases anywhere within 6&quot of the victim. If the victim was inside a transport vehicle it is assumed he staggered out before dying. Any bases that cannot be placed due to impassible terrain, enemy within 1&quot or because you have run out of models, are lost.
descriptions.name: The Sarge is Acting Strangely

descriptions.description: Ane unengaged Tyranid units that are not falling back and have not gone to ground, must take a Leadership test at the beginning of their Movement phase:; If the test is passed the unit acts normally; If the test is failed the unit becomes subject to Rage special rule. In addition, the unit may not fire any weapons in the Shooring phase, though it may still run.

In addiotion, if any unit is deploying using Deep Strike, the may be placed within 6&quot of a Lictor and will no scatter. Does not work if the Lictror itself has arrived from reserve during the same turn
descriptions.name: Pheromone Trail

descriptions.description: Lictors always start the game in reserve, even in missions that do not normally use this rule. Independent Characters cannot join a Lictor Brood before it arrives from reserve. When Lictors become available they are placed anywhere on the battlefield that is is more than 1&quot away from any enemy model. Lictors may not move or assault on the turn they arrive, although they can shoot (or run) normally.

descriptions.description: All enemy infantry units within 12&quot of Deathleaper roll one less dice (to a minimum of one) whe moving through difficult terrain.

descriptions.description: Enemy units wishing to shoot at Deathleaper has Shrouded special rule
descriptions.name: Where Is It?

descriptions.description: if Deathleaper ends its Movement phase more that 1&quot from any enemy model, the owning player can decide that it will blend into the background. If the player elects to do so, remove Deathleaper from the table and place him back into reserve. In the subsequent Tyranid Movement phase, Deathleaper can be re-deployed following the normal rules for Chameleonic Skin
descriptions.name: Where'd It Go?

descriptions.description: Mycetic Spore
descriptions.name: Mycetic Spore

descriptions.description: The Venomthrope unit and any friendly units within 6&quot of the unit, have 5+ cover save against any shooting attacks. Any non-vehicle enemy model that charge one of these units must ake a dangerous terrain test to represent the toxic effects of the spore cloud. In addition enemy units do not gain their bonus Attacks for charging a Venomthorpe Brood. Should the Venomthrope be killed, these bonunses are immediately lost.

descriptions.description: Close combat attacks are poisoned (2+)

descriptions.name: Immobile Pod

descriptions.description: A Mycetic Spore is not subject to Instinctive Behaviour. The Mycetic Spore automatically shoots the closest enemy unit in each Shootin phase unless it is engaged in close combat
descriptions.name: Limited Sentience

descriptions.description: A Mycetic Spore can carry a single unit of up to 20 infantry models or a single monstrous creature within its armoured shell. Once the Mycetic Sporehas landed, all creatures within must immediately deploy - place the unit such that every model is within 6&quot of the Mycetic Spore. If any models cannot be deployed because of impassable terrain or enemy models within 1&quot, those models are destroyed. A unit that Deep Strikes via a Mycetic Spore cannot move or assault in the same turn it arrives but may shoot or run.

If the test is failed the unit suffers a single wound for each point they failed by, with no armour save allowed

descriptions.description: Psychic shooting power.; 24&quot S:X AP:1, Assault 1, Large Blast; The St is equal to the number of the wounds The Doom of Malan'tai has when the power is used. After the power has been used, but befoere any additional Wounds are gained, the Doom of Malan'tai suffers D3 wounds with no saves (of any kind)

They cannot choose the same alteration in two consecutive player turns.; Slashing Claws: +1 Strength; Tentacled Limbs: +1 Attack; Protective Carapace: +1 Toughness
descriptions.name: Alter Form

descriptions.description: Genestealers are not subject to Instinctive Behaviour rule

descriptions.description: Ymgarl Genestealers can elect to start the game in dormant state provided there is at least one piece of area terrain large enough to accommodate the entire unit. If you choose to do this, the brood is not deployed with the rest of the army. Instead after both sides have deployerd, secretly write down which pisce of terrain they are lying dormant in. When the brood becomes available from reserve, they must be deployed such that all models are within the selected terrain. If any models cannot be placed inside this terrain due to impassable terrain or enemy within 1&quot, they are destroyed. The Ymgarl Genestealers can move and assault normally in the same turn they are revealed.

This uses the following procedure:; 1) Take a Leadership test and on a double '1' or double '6' take the following effects:; Double '1': All wounds suffered during the phase are restored. All removed casualties return on the table with coherency of their squads and 1&quot away from any enemies. These models immediately make Pile in move; Double '6': The entire squad is removed from play as casualties; 2) If other result is rolled, compare the dice roll to the unit's Leadership value, taking into account modifiers, including any from the combat result. For each point the unit fails its Daemonic Instability test by, it suffers one additional Wond (owning player allocates) with no saves of any kind allowed.

descriptions.name: Blind Grenades

descriptions.description: Strength of bolt pistols, boltguns, storm bolters, heavy bolters, hurricane bolter, autocannons and assault cannons is increased by 1
descriptions.name: Psybolt Ammunition

descriptions.description: Used in tha Assault phase, after assault moves have been made but before any blows are struck. Nominate one enemy model in base contact with the bearer. That model must pass an Initiative test. If the test is failed, the victim cannot strike any blows durin this Assault phase
descriptions.name: Empyrean Brain Mines

descriptions.description: When a unit equipped with psychotroke grenades launches an assault or is assaulted, roll a D6 for each enemy unit being assaulted or is assaulting to see what the effect is. The effects last for the duration of a single Assault phase:; 1 - No effect; 2 - The enemy unit is hit automatically and attack with a maximum of 1 Attack per model; 3 - You can re-roll failed to hit rolls against that enemy unit; 4 - The enemy unit LD is reduced to 2; 5 - The enemy unit is reduced to Initiative 1; 6 - Every model must take an Initiative test. Any models that fail must strike blows against their own unit.
descriptions.name: Psychotroke Grenades

descriptions.description: During a turn in which a unit equipped with rad grenades launches an assault, or is assaulted, the enemy unit(s) suffer a -1 penalty to Toughness until the end of the phase (this does affect the victims's instant death threshold).
descriptions.name: Rad Grenades

descriptions.description: Ranged weapon that can be used provided that the bearer did not move in the preceding Movement phase. Alway scatter the full 2D6&quot. Uses one of the following profiles:; Barrage bomb: Unlimited R, S:6 AP:4, Ordance D3, Large Blast, Barrage; Lance Strike: Unlimited R, S:10 AP:1, Heavy 1, Blast, Lance; Psyk-out Bomb - Unlimited R, S:6 AP:4, Ordnance 1, Large Blast, Psi-shock: Any psyker hit suffers the perils of warp in addition to any other effects
descriptions.name: Orbital Strike Relay

descriptions.description: Master-crafted Weapon
descriptions.name: Master-crafted Weapon

descriptions.description: S:U AP:3, Melee, Daemonbane*, Force; Re-rolls any failed to-wound rolls
descriptions.name: Anointed Blade

descriptions.description: Used at the start of the Fight sub-phase, after assault moves have been made, but before any blows have been struck.; Choose an enemt unit in base contact. Any Daemonic Gifts in that unit cease to work until the end of the phase.
descriptions.name: Dark Excommunication

descriptions.description: Used at the start of caster's Assault phase. Choose a friendly unit within 6&quot (it could be the caster himself). This unit have +1 Strength and rolls additional D6 for armour penetration
descriptions.name: Might Of Titan

descriptions.description: Used at the start of the enemy Charge sub-phase. Any enemy models attempting to assault friendly units from the Grey Knights Codex within 12 of the caster that turn treat all terrain, including open ground, as both difficult and dangerous.
descriptions.name: Sanctuary

descriptions.description: Used at the start of the enemy Shooting phase. The caster and all friendly units within 6&quot gain Stealth until the end of the turn. If the unit is not in cover, it gains 6+ cover save instead
descriptions.name: The Shrouding

descriptions.description: Used at the start of the caster's Movement phase. Choose a friendly, non-vehicle unit that is not locked in combat anywhere on the battlefield. The chosen unit is removed from the table top and immediately placed anywhere within 6&quot of the caster using Deep Strike rules.
descriptions.name: The Summoning

descriptions.description: Shooting psychic power with the profile:; Template, St:* AP:- Assault 1; The target unit must take an Initiative test for each non-vehicle model hit. For every test that is failed, one model is removed as a casualty with no saving throws allowed. Vehicles take a single penetrating hit instead
descriptions.name: Warp Rift

descriptions.description: If an enemy units arrives from reserve within 12&quot of Coteaz and within his LoS, Coteaz and his unit can immediately make an out-of-sequence shooting attack against it. There is no limit on how many times the ability can be used in a turn
descriptions.name: I've Been Expecting You

descriptions.description: Coteaz allows you to re-roll the dice to Seize the Initiateve, or force your opponent to re-roll his
descriptions.name: Spy Network

descriptions.description: Counts as a weapon:24&quot S:4 AP:- Assault D6;
descriptions.name: Psyber-eagle

descriptions.description: When Karamazov's Orbital Strike relay is 'fired', you can shoose to plase the template so its centre is over a friendly model, rather thatn an enemy - even if that friendly model is in combat. If you do so, the shot does not scatter. All models under the tamplate are hit as normal
descriptions.name: By Any Means Necessary

descriptions.description: Karamazov can always choose to pass or fail Morale and Pinning tests as he wishes. Frienldy units within 12&quot re-roll failed Morale and Pinning tests
descriptions.name: Dread Reputation

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:8 AP:1, Heavy 1, Melta, Master-crafted
descriptions.name: Master-crafted Multi-melta

descriptions.description: S:U AP:3 Melee, Master-crafted
descriptions.name: Master-crafted Power Sword

descriptions.description: 2+ Armour save; Cannot embark transport vehicles

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:3 AP:-, Pistol

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:10 AP:1, Pistol, One shot
descriptions.name: Graviton Beamer

descriptions.description: S:U AP:3, Melee; Grants additional +2 Attacks, which are rolled seperately. If a double is rolled on to hit roll for this attacks, this attacks are resolved ahainst Inquisitor Valeria herself
descriptions.name: The Dagger Of Midnight

descriptions.description: Can be used instead of making close combat attacks in that round. Choose a character or monstrous creature in base contact with Valeria. The victim must immediately roll equal to or under its remaining Wounds on a D6 or be removed as casualty with no saves of any kind allowed
descriptions.name: Hyperstone Maze

descriptions.description: Successful saves taken against Valeria's shooting or close combat attacks must be-rolled
descriptions.name: Runes Of Destiny

descriptions.description: S:U AP:-, Melee, Two-handed. Has two powers, randomly generated from the following list before the army is deployed. In case of same result rolled twice, you can choose the second power:; 2-3: Warpflame - +3 Strength; 4: Unholy speed - +3 Attacks; 5: Etherblade - Power weapon; 6: Vampyre - For each unsaved wound inflicted, the bearer immediately gains +1 Wound (up to 10); 7: Daemonic Feud - Wound daemons on 2+. Daemons must re-roll successful Invulnerable save against this weapon; 8: Deathlust - The bearer has Furious Charge and Rage special rules; 9: Dark Ressurection - The bearer has Feel No Pain and Eternal Warrior; 10: Daemon Venom - The weapon is Poisoned (2+); 11-12: Familiar - The bearer counts as being one Mastery Level Higher than normal. The Daemonblade becomes Force Weapon
descriptions.name: Daemonblade

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:5 AP:3, Heavy 1, Rending
descriptions.name: Hellrifle

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:7 AP:4, Assault 2 or Heavy 4, Rending

descriptions.name: Inferno Pistol

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:4 AP:5, Rapid Fire. Can fire instead once per game with:; 24&quot S:5 AP:- Assault 1,; Psyshock: Any psyker taking an unsaved Wound suffers the Perils of Warp in addition to any other effects
descriptions.name: Condemnor Boltgun

descriptions.description: S:U AP:3, Melee; Any unsaved wounds caused by Null Rod inflict instant death on psykers. In addition, the bearer and his squad cannot be affected by psychic powers (friendly or enemy) in any way
descriptions.name: Null Rod

descriptions.description: The bearer (and his unit) counts as having BS:10 if shooting at a psyker, or a unit, caontaining one or more psykers.
descriptions.name: Psyocculum

descriptions.description: 12 S:3 AP:2, Pistol; Always wounds on 2+
descriptions.name: Needle Pistol

descriptions.description: S:U AP:-, Melee, Poisoned (2+)
descriptions.name: Scythian Venom Talon

descriptions.description: Models firing plasma weapons( including plasma pistols, plasma guns and plasma cannons) while within 12&quot of a bearer will count as BS:1
descriptions.name: Ulumeathi Plasma Syphon

descriptions.description: Brotherhood Of Psykers
descriptions.name: Brotherhood Of Psykers

descriptions.description: All models un the same unit as the Brotherhood Banner have +1 Attack whilst the banner bearer is alive. Additionally, the unit will automatically pass its Psychic test to 'avtivate' its force weapons.
descriptions.name: Brotherhood Banner

descriptions.name: Preferred Enemy (Daemon)

descriptions.description: May force opponent to re-roll dice on vehicle demage table but must accept the second result.

descriptions.name: Nemesis Doomfist

descriptions.name: Psyflame Ammunition

descriptions.description: When Callidus Assassin from reserve, choose an enemy unit. This unit immediately takes D6 S:4 AP:2 hits. The Callidus Assassin is then placed anywhere within 3&quot of that unit using Deep Strike rules, but does not scatter.
descriptions.name: Polymorphine

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:X AP:1, Pistol, Sniper; Always use one of the following ammunition:; Hellfire: Always wounds on a 2+; Shield-Breaker: When a woud from this round is allocated to a model, that model loses any unvulnerable saves granted by items of wargear immediately, and for the rest of the battle. Remaining saves (if any) can then be taken; Turbo-Penetrator: Inflicts 2 wounds on any non-vehicle model wounded, rather than 1. A turbo-penetrator shot has an Armour Penetration of 4D6
descriptions.name: Executioner Pistol

descriptions.name: Animus Speculum

descriptions.description: Wounds caused by a Vindicare's shooting attacks are always allocated by the Vindicare's controlling player

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:X AP:1, Pistol, Sniper; Always use one of the following ammunition:; Hellfire: Always wounds on a 2+; Shield-Breaker: When a woud from this round is allocated to a model, that model loses any unvulnerable saves granted by items of wargear immediately, and for the rest of the battle. Remaining saves (if any) can then be taken; Turbo-Penetrator: Inflicts 2 wounds on any non-vehicle model wounded, rather than 1. A turbo-penetrator shot has an Armour Penetration of 4D6

Remaining saves (if any) can then be taken; Turbo-Penetrator: Inflicts 2 wounds on any non-vehicle model wounded, rather than 1. A turbo-penetrator shot has an Armour Penetration of 4D6
descriptions.name: Exitus Rifle

descriptions.name: Arco-flagellant

descriptions.name: Banisher

Initiative increased to 10; Warp Strength - Strength increased to 6; 5: Energy Torrent - 24&quot S:4 AP:3, Assault 1, Blast; 6: Unholy Gaze - 24&quot S:8 AP:4, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Daemonic Power

descriptions.description: When an Inquisitorial Henchmen Warband Containing one or more Jokaero is deployed, roll a D6 on the following chart. Each time you roll, add +1 to the result for each Jokaero in the unit beyond the first.All results apply for the duration of the game:; 1: Aesthetic Alteration - no effect; 2: Improved Gun Sights - All non-template shooting weapons in the unit have their maximum range increased by 12" 3: Reinforced Armour - Models in the unit treat their armour save as being one better than normal; 4: Penetrating Ammunition - All shooting weapons in the unit are Rending; 5: Augmentative Energy Fields - All models in the unit have a 5+ Invulnerable save; 6+: The Works - Roll twice more on the tabke and apply both results. Ignore dublicate results (including dublicate rolls of 6)
descriptions.name: Inconceivable Customisation

descriptions.description: Each turn a Jokaero can have his digital weapons fire as on of the following weapons: lascannon, multi-melta or heavy flamer. All Jokaero in the same unit must choose the same weapon.
descriptions.name: Jokaero Ingenuity

descriptions.description: 5+ Invulnerable save
descriptions.name: Defence Orbs

descriptions.description: Friendly units arriving via Deep Strike within 6&quot do not scatter.
descriptions.name: Psychic Beacon

descriptions.description: Psychic Shooting Attack:; 36&quot S:3 AP:6, Assault 1, Large blast; The strength is increased by 1 for each additional Psyker in the unit beyond the first; The AP of the attack improves by 1 for each additional Psyker in the unit beyond the first.; Only one Psychic Barrage is fired, regardless of the number of psykers in the squad. All psykers in the same unit are treated as a single psyker for the purposes of Psyhic tests, etc and use their own Leadership valse, not that of any attached characters. The controlling player can measure range and LOS from any psyker model. If the squad suffers the Perils of the Warp, all psykers in the squad suffer the effects.
descriptions.name: Psychic Barrage

descriptions.description: 18 S:3 AP:3, Rapid Fire
descriptions.name: Hot-shot Lasgun

descriptions.name: Amphibious

descriptions.name: Multi-laser

descriptions.name: Justicar

descriptions.name: Justicar Thawn

descriptions.description: Every time Thawn is removed as casualty, leave counter in place to mark the spot where he 'died'. Roll a D6 at the start of each of your susequent turns. If the result is a 4 or more, place him back on the battlefield with his wound restored, within 1&quot of the counter - he is treated as a seperate unit from this point; ; Thawn can act normally in a turn in which he 'resurrects'. Thawn does not award kill points to the enemy if he is alive on the battlefield at the end of the game, regardless of how many times he was 'killed'.
descriptions.name: I Shall Not Yield

descriptions.description: Unit becomes Jump Infantry; Once per game, the unit can make a teleport shunt instead of moving; If making a teleport shunt, the unit immediately makes a move of up to 30&quot in any direction. This move cannot end on top of another unit or impassable terrain, but ignores intervening units, terrain and so on. The unit cannot assault in the same turn, but can shoot or run as normal. The unit counts as having moved.
descriptions.name: Personal Teleporter

descriptions.description: Skies Fury
descriptions.name: Skies Fury

descriptions.description: 72&quot S:4 AP:5, Heavy 1, Blast, One-shot, Psi-shock: Any psyker hit suffers the perils of warp in addition to any other effects
descriptions.name: Mindstrike Missile

descriptions.description: 2+ Armour Save, 5+ Invulnerable Save; Deep strike (Even if Mission rules do not permit it)
descriptions.name: Dreadknight Armour

descriptions.description: S:U AP:2, Melee, Daemonbane*, Force; Bearer may re-roll failed to hit, to wound and armour penetration rolls; Daemonbane: (Any Daemon or psyker that suffer one or more unsaved wounds must take a Leadership test. If its failed, the model is removed as a casualty)
descriptions.name: Nemesis Greatsword

descriptions.description: Template S:6 AP:4, Heavy 1; Place a template, so that the narrow end is within 12&quot of the weapon and the large end is no closer to the weapon that the narrow end.
descriptions.name: Heavy Incinerator

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:4 AP:-, Heavy 12, Always wounds daemons on 4+ or better
descriptions.name: Gatling Psilencer

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:7 AP:4, Assault 1, Large Blast, Rending
descriptions.name: Heavy Psycannon

descriptions.description: One per game, Logan can increase Attack number by 1 to all friendly models within 18&quot.
descriptions.name: Living Legend

descriptions.description: May appy a single special rule to himself and the squad he joined - at the beginning of the turn select one special rule from the list:; Fearless, Tank Hunters, Relentless, Preferred Enemy.; Squad gains this rule until the end of the player turn.
descriptions.name: The High King

descriptions.description: May split attacks between theese two modes:; [Frost Blade]: S:+1 AP:3, Melee; [Power Fist]: S:x2 AP:2, Melee, Specialist Weapon, Unwieldy
descriptions.name: The Axe Morkai

descriptions.description: Against models with a WS valuse, always hits the enemy on 3+ in close combat regardless of WS
descriptions.name: Wolftooth Necklace

descriptions.description: If a model with a Wolf Tail Talisman or the unit he is with is affected by an enemy psychic power, on a D6 roll of 5+ that power is nullified.
descriptions.name: Wolf Tail Talisman

descriptions.description: 4+ invulnerable save
descriptions.name: The Belt Of Russ

descriptions.description: Any unit within 6&quot including the character and his unit, may re-roll failed Morale tests.; Oath: The character must not fall back or go to ground.
descriptions.name: Saga Of Majesty

descriptions.description: Njial knows all Space Wolves psychic powers and may use up to two powers per turn.
descriptions.name: Master Psyker

descriptions.description: At the begginning of Njal's turn, roll a D3 and add the turn number to the result. Refer to the table below for tempests'effects that game turn. Only enemy models in Njal's Line of Sight can be affected by the tempest's effects.; 2 - No Effect; 3 - Enemy models within 24&quot are at -1 BS this turn.; 4 - Enemy infantry within 24&quot move as if the were in difficult terrain.; 5 - At the end of Njal's Assault phase, all unengaged enemy units within 18&quot must pass a Morale test or fall back.; 6 - one model within 18&quot takes D3 S:9 hits. Vehicles are hit in side armor.; 7+ - At the end of Njal's Shooting phase, unengaged enemy units within 12&quot of Njal take D6 S:8 AP5 hits.
descriptions.name: Lord Of Tempests

descriptions.description: Counts as a Runic Stave (S:+2 AP:4, Melee, Concussive, Force, On a roll of 4+ negates any enemy psychic power within 24&quot. Always wounds Daemons on 2+.) but negates enemy powers on a roll of 3+
descriptions.name: Stuff Of The Stormcaller

descriptions.description: In the assault phase a single model in base contact with Njal (chosen by the owning player) suffers D3 S:3 hits at Initiative of 5
descriptions.name: Nightwing

descriptions.description: 2+ armour save and a special 5+ invulnerable save against all wounds caused by psychic powers
descriptions.name: Runic Armour

descriptions.description: Grants 2+ armor save, 4+ invilnerable save, Relentless special rule. May Deep Strike even if mission does not allow to do this. May not be transported in Rhino or Razorback. May not make Sweeping Advance. Counts as 2 models in other transports.
descriptions.name: Runic Terminator Armour

descriptions.description: When Ulrik and any model in the squad he has joined allocate their attacks against a model with a Toughtss of 5 or more, they may re-roll all failed rolls To Hit and To Wound
descriptions.name: Slayer's Oath

descriptions.description: You may pick one other model in the army as having being personally trained by Ulrik (this may not be a Unique model). This model hains +1 WS to a maximum of 6.
descriptions.name: Mentor

descriptions.description: All models in the same squad as a Wolf Priest are counted as Fearless
descriptions.name: Fang Of Morkai

descriptions.description: 4+ invulnerable save
descriptions.name: Wolf Amulet

descriptions.description: Any Space Wolves unit that can trace Line of Sight to Ulrik may re-roll failed Morale tests they are called upon to make. In addition, any enemy with the Independent Character special rule who wants to allocate any close combat attacks toward Ulrik must first pass a Leadership test. If they fail they may not attack at all that turn.
descriptions.name: Wolf Helm Of Russ

descriptions.description: May use number of enemy models in base contact as number of his own Attacks instead of a basic number of Attacks in profile. This number of attacks may be modified by a second CCW, bonus for charging and so on.
descriptions.name: Wrath Of The Savage

descriptions.description: Ant unit of Fenrisian Wolves within 12&quot of Canis may use his Leadership value instead of their own.
descriptions.name: Lord Of The Wolfkin

descriptions.description: [S:U AP:3, Melee, Shred, Specialist Weapon]; or [S:U AP:3, Melee, Specialist Weapon, Re-rolls To Hit]
descriptions.name: Wolf Claw

descriptions.description: canis wolfborn's mount
descriptions.name: Fangir

descriptions.description: Fenrisian Wolves and Cyberwolves in the same army as the character have Ini 5 and Ld 7.; Oath: At least one Fenrisian Wolf or Thunderwolf should survive the battle for the character to keep his oath
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Wolfkin

descriptions.description: An army can re-roll the dice in the roll-off to see who picks their deployment zone first (after seeing the opponent's score!)
descriptions.name: Ancient Tactician

descriptions.description: 5+ invulnerable save against any glancing or penetrating hit
descriptions.name: Ward Of The Primarch

descriptions.description: If a Bjorn is wrecked or explodes, leave the model in place. From that point all friendly Space Wolves become Fearless for the rest ot he game. Bjorn's remains are counted as a special objective that awards 1 Victory Point in missions that use objectives (this one do not count as a misterious objective). Furthersome, in missions that offer Victory Points for each enemy unit that has been completely destroyed, the owning Space Wolves player's opponent instead gains D3 Victory Points for destroying Bjorn.
descriptions.name: Living Relic

descriptions.description: Dreadnought CCW
descriptions.name: Dreadnought Close Combat Weapon

descriptions.description: S:+2 AP:2, Melee, Unwieldy
descriptions.name: Frost Axe

descriptions.description: S:+1 AP:3, Melee
descriptions.name: Frost Blade

descriptions.description: +1 St, +1 To, +1 At. Becomes cavalry. May only join Thunderwolf Cavalry or Fenrisian Wolves units. Has Rending special rule in close combat with any attack that does not use a special close combat weapon
descriptions.name: Thunderwolf Mount

descriptions.description: Fenrisian Wolves
descriptions.name: Fenrisian Wolves

descriptions.description: Model bearing the Mark of the Wulfen has Rending special rule in close combat. Futhersome he replaces his usual Attacks characteristic with D6+1, rolled immediately prior to when the model makes his attacks. These attacks are not affected by wargear, additional hand weapons and so on, though they may be bolstered by other factors (the bonus for charging, Logan Grimnatr's Living Legend ability, etc
descriptions.name: Mark Of The Wulfen

descriptions.description: The character may re-roll failed To Hit rolls against walkers, monstrous creatures and models with Toughness of 5 or more.; Oath: The character must slain at least one model from the list above before the end of the game
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Beastslayer

descriptions.description: During the Assault phase, the character gers bonus attacks equal to the number of models he killed duriong the previous Assault phase.; Oath: The character must slain at least 10 models
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Warrior Born

descriptions.description: The character has Eternal Warrior rule.; Oath: The character must deal a killing blow to an enemy character before the end of the game
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Bear

descriptions.description: Choose a single Runic Weapon from the following:; [Runic Sword]: S:U AP:3, Melee, Force, Special*; [Runic Axe]: S:+1 AP:2, Melee, Unwieldy, Force, Special*; [Runic Stave]: S:+2 AP:4, Melee, Concussive, Force, Special*; Special: On a roll of 4+ negates any enemy psychic power within 24&quot. Always wounds Daemons on 2+.
descriptions.name: Runic Weapon

descriptions.description: An army that includes a Chooser of the Slain may place a Chooser marker anywhere upon the battledield before the enemy deployed. This marker must be smaller than the Rune Priest model and cannot be destroyed. Enemy units may not use their Infiltrate rule to deploy within 18&quot of a Chooser marker. Should the Rune Priest make a shooting attack at a target that has line of sight to the Chooser marker, he may treat his BS as one higher than normal.
descriptions.name: Chooser Of The Slain

descriptions.description: Becomes Psyker (Level 2)
descriptions.name: Master Of Runes

descriptions.description: The Wolf Priest may nominate one unit type at the beginning of the game - 'infantry' or 'monstrous creatures', for example. He and any squad he joins have the Prefered Enemy rule against that unit type.
descriptions.name: Oath Of War

descriptions.description: The character gains Stealth rule and may also Outflank.; Oath: The character must always be held in reserve at the beginning of the game
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Hunter

descriptions.description: Can attempt to restore a single hullpoint or repair one vehicle immobilise or weapon destroyed effect instead of shooting. Takes effect on a roll of 5+. Gets +1 modifier for each thrall-servitor with a servo-arm in the unit
descriptions.name: Battlesmith

descriptions.description: Ane vehicle containing the character may move an extra D3&quot, and the character adds one to any repair roll he makes.; Oath: The character must be within the enemy deployment zone at the end of the battle
descriptions.name: Saga Of The Iron Wolf

descriptions.description: If Wolf Scout unit make use of its ability to aourflank, roll a dice when it enters play to see where it may be deployed. On a roll of 1 unit enters play from the short table edge to owning player's left, on a 2 they enter play from the short table edge to the owning player's right, and on a 3-6 they enter play from any table edge.
descriptions.name: Behind Enemy Lines

descriptions.description: May never join or be joined bo other models.
descriptions.name: Pack Of One

descriptions.description: A Lone Wolf has the Eternal Warrior and Feel No Pain rules. Futhersome, in missions that award Victory Points, a Lone Wolf does not concede a Victory Point if he dies in battle. Instead he will concede a Victory Point if he survives till the end of game.
descriptions.name: A Glorious Death

descriptions.description: Arjac Rockfist
descriptions.name: Arjac Rockfist

descriptions.description: May re-roll all failed rolls To Hit against an enemy with the Independent Character of Monstrous Creature rule. Arjac must always issue and accept a challenge whenever possible.
descriptions.name: Grimnar's Champion

descriptions.description: [Melee]: S:x2 AP:1, Melee, Concussive, Specialist Weapon, Unwieldy; [Ranged]: 6&quot S:10 AP:1, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Foehammer

descriptions.description: Storm Shield (3+ invulnerable save. Model may never claim bonus attack for second close combat weapon); Grants an additional attack in the first round of any assault.
descriptions.name: Anvil Shield

descriptions.description: Once per game, a unit that includes a wolf standard may call upon the power of the wolf. For the duration of the next Assault Phase, all models un that unit may re-roll any dice rollf of a 1.
descriptions.name: Wolf Standard

descriptions.description: Lucas The Trickster
descriptions.name: Lucas The Trickster

descriptions.description: Models gain +2 Attacks when they charge ragher than normal +1. Does not apply to models that may have joined the pack. Does not work then launching a Counter Attack
descriptions.name: Berserk Charge

descriptions.description: If the squad has enemy models within 6&quot in the beginning of Shooting phase it must forego its Shooting phase and launch assault in the Assault phase . Does not work if a Wolf Guard model or Independent character accompanies the pack.
descriptions.name: Headstrong

descriptions.description: Leadership of Lukas and the unit he has joined may never be increased by any means
descriptions.name: Rebellious

descriptions.description: Should Lukas ever be removed from play, both players roll a dice - if the Space Wolves player rolls equal to or higher than his opponent, all models in base contact with him are also removed from play as casualties
descriptions.name: The Last Laugh

descriptions.description: Opponent must re-roll any successful To Hit roll witch is allocated directly against Lukas
descriptions.name: Pelt Of The Doppegangrel

descriptions.description: Swiftclaw Attack Bike
descriptions.name: Swiftclaw Attack Bike

descriptions.description: Cyberwolf
descriptions.name: Cyberwolf

descriptions.description: As long as the Squad Leader is still alive and does not shoot in the Shooting phase the unit may splot its fire and fire at two different targets instead of one.
descriptions.name: Fire Control

descriptions.description: Command Barge
descriptions.name: Command Barge

descriptions.description: If a model is removed as a casualty, place an Ever-living counter where the model has removed from play. At the end of the phase, roll for this couter, just as you would for a Reanimation Protocols.; ; If a model has joined a unit when it was removed as a casualty, and the roll was passed, it must be returned to play in coherency with that unit. If the model had not joined a unit, it must be returned to play within 3&quot of the counter. In either case, the model must be placed at least 1&quot away from enemy models. If the model is placed in coherency with one or more friendly units that is eligible to join, it automatically joins on of those units. If the model was locked in close combat, it must immediately pile in.
descriptions.name: Ever-living

descriptions.description: If a Craracter loses its final Wound to Imotekh's close combat attacks, Imotekh counts as having scored extra D3 wounds in close combat for the purposes of calculating the assault result
descriptions.name: Humiliating Defeat

descriptions.description: If Imotekh is your Warlord, you Seize the Initiative on a roll 4+ against all armies but the Orks - you may not seize the initiative against Orks at all.
descriptions.name: Hyperlogical Strategy

descriptions.description: The Night Fighting rules automatically apply during the first game turn. In subsequent game turns roll a D6 at the start of the turn. If result is equal or greater than the turn number, the Night Fighting rules remain in play. If not - the Night Fighting rules cease to be in effect are are not used for the rest of the battle.; ; In addition, whilst the Night Fighting rules remain in play, roll a D6 for each unengaged enemy unit on the battlefield at the start of each Necron Shooting phase. On a result of 6, that unit suffers D6 S:8 AP:5 hits (vehicles are hit on their side armour). Night Fighting rules brought into play by Solar Pulse do not generate lightning.
descriptions.name: Lord Of The Storm

descriptions.description: A Phaeron and his unit are relentless
descriptions.name: Phaeron

descriptions.description: Whenever a unit takes one or more casualties, place counters or other suitable markers next to the unit. If the unit makes a fall back move, remove any counters.; ; At the end of the phase, after any Morale checks have been taken and fall back moves have been made, roll a D6 for each counter. On a roll 1-4 nothing happens. On 5-6 return slain model to play with a single Wound, placed in coherency with a model from its unit that has not itself returned through Reanimation Protocols this phase.; ; Models returning to play must be placed at least 1&quot from enemy models. Models that cannot be placed in this way do not return. If the mode's unit is engaged in close combat, the model immediately piles in.; ; Reanimation protocols cant be attempted if the unit has been destroyed.
descriptions.name: Reanimation Protocols

descriptions.description: At the start of the first game turn, randomly choose one non-vehicle unit in the enemy army. Any Flayed One packs entering play via Deep Strike do not scatter if they aim to arrive within 6&quot of this unit.
descriptions.name: Bloodswarm Nanoscarabs

descriptions.description: Close combat weapon. Attacks made with this weapon re-roll failed To Hit and To Wound rolls. May also be used as a shooting weapon:; Template S:4 AP:5, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Gauntlet Of Fire

descriptions.description: 3+ Invulnerable save
descriptions.name: Phase Shifter

descriptions.description: One use only. First time, the model passes its Reanimation Protocols, it returnes with D3 wounds
descriptions.name: Phylactery

descriptions.description: 2+ Armour save
descriptions.name: Sempiternal Weave

descriptions.description: 2D6&quot S:6 AP:1, Assault 1, One use only; Nominate a direction, roll 2D6 and extend a straight line from the Imothekh's base. Any unit, friendly or enemy, under this line takes a number of hits equal to the number of models in the unit under the line
descriptions.name: Staff Of The Destroyer

descriptions.description: Vehicle nullifies suffered crew shaken results on a roll of 2+ and crew stunned results on a roll of 4+
descriptions.name: Living Metal

descriptions.description: Whilst a character remains embaked on a Catacomb Command Barge, he can make three special 'sweep' attacks each turn. these attacks can be made in the Movement phase agaist one enemy unit that the catacomb Command Barge moves over. All attacks must be resolved on the same unit.; ; If the Catacomb Command Barge moved at combat speed this turn, a Sweep Attack hits on 3+, otherwise it hits on 4+. Fir each success, the unit suffers a hit at the characters' Strength pllus any Strength bonuses and special abilities from his close combat weapon. Hits against vehicles are resolved against rear armour. On a Sweep Attack where the To Hit dice roll is a 6, you can choose which model the resulting Wound (if there is one) is allocated against. Cover saves are not permitted
descriptions.name: Sweep Attack

descriptions.description: If the Catacomb Command Barge siffers an immobilised or weapon destroyed result, or loses a Hull Point, the embarked character can reduse his remaining wounds by 1 to negate the result. This cannot be dobe if it would cause the character to be removed as a casualty
descriptions.name: Symbiotic Repair

descriptions.description: +2 to Front and Side armour until the first penetrating hit
descriptions.name: Quantum Shielding

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:6 AP:-, Assault 2, Tesla
descriptions.name: Tesla Cannon

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:5 AP:3, Assault 2, Gauss
descriptions.name: Gauss Cannon

descriptions.description: At the start of each of your turn in which Nemesor Zahndrekh is on the battlefield, choose one friendly unit, then choose one oth the following special rules:; - Counter-attack; - Furious Charge; - Hit and Run; - Night Vision; - Stealth; - Tank Hunters; The chosen unit has the chosen special rule until the start of your next turn
descriptions.name: Adaptive Tactics

descriptions.description: At the start of each of your turns in which Nemesor Zahndrekh is on the battlefield, choose one enemy unit within his line of sight. That unit looses the following special rules and cannot gain them until the start of your next turn:; - Counter-attack; - Furious Charge; - Hit and Run; - Night Vision; - Stealth; - Tank Hunters
descriptions.name: Counter Tactics

descriptions.description: if Nemesor Zahndrekh is on the battlefield, any number of units in reserve that are able to Deep Strike, can choose to enter play in the enemy turn via Deep Strike, immediately after any enemy unit has arrived from reserve normally during the enemy's Movement phase.
descriptions.name: Phased Reinforcements

descriptions.description: The bearer and his unit pass Reanimation rolls on a 4+.
descriptions.name: Resurrection Orb

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:5 AP:3, Assault 3
descriptions.name: Staff Of Light

descriptions.description: Keep track of the number of Attacks that fail To Hit against Obyron before he makes his on attacks. For each miss, Obyron can make additional Attack (up to 6)
descriptions.name: Cleaving Counterblow

descriptions.description: If Obyron uses hist Ghostwalk Mantle, he does not scatter providing that he aims to arrive within 6&quot of Nemesor Zahndrekh.; If an enemy unit launches an assault on Nemesor Zahndrekh's unit, Obyron immediately leaves his unit and must pile in to that combat regardless of how far from it he is. Any enemy units no longer locked in combat as a result of this pile in move immediately consolidates.
descriptions.name: The Vargard's Duty

descriptions.description: Can be used in your Movement phase instead of moving normally. Obyron and his unit are removed from the tabletop and replaced tohether anywhere on the board uning Deep Strike rules. Can be used in close combat
descriptions.name: Ghostwalk Mantle

descriptions.description: S:+2 AP:1, Melee, Armourbane, Two-handed
descriptions.name: Warscythe

descriptions.description: Before deploying, nominate a unit of Necron Warriors or Immortals. The unit recieve one upgrade from the list (roll D6 to determine):; 1-2 Hardened Carapace: Tougnes is increased to 5; 3-4 Improved Optics: BS is increased to 5; 5-6 Enhanced Servomotors: ST is increased to 5
descriptions.name: Mechanical Augmentation

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:8 AP:2, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Eldrich Lance

descriptions.description: While Cryptek is alive, he and his unit are treated as armed with defensive grenades.
descriptions.name: Gaze Of Flame

descriptions.description: Can be used once at the start of one of your turns. For the remainder of the turn, any unsuccessful reserve rolls must be re-rolled.
descriptions.name: Lord Of Time

descriptions.description: During the first game turn, all enemy units that move count as moving through difficult terrain. If they are actually moving through difficult terrain ,then a unit can move the lowest D6 result of their difficult terrain test, rather than the highest
descriptions.name: Temporal Snares

descriptions.description: Roll D6 at the start of each of your turns. If the dice roll is less than or equal to the turn number, Orikan uses the 'Orikan Empowered' profile. Continue to roll a D6 at the start of each of your turns. If the result is less than or equal to the turn number, Orikan returns to his initial profile and no further transformation rolls are made.; Wounds suffered are carried over between incarnations
descriptions.name: The Stars Are Right

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:X AP:-, Heavy 1, Exile Ray: If a shot hits, randomly selected model in a target unit must pass a Strength test or be removed as a casualty.
descriptions.name: Transdimensional Beamer

descriptions.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, choose an enemy vehicle within 18&quot and in LoS. On a roll of 3+ you can immediately shoot with it as if it were your unit. The vehicle cannot alter its facing, and fires as if it ha not moved. For the purposes of this attack, ignore any 'crew stunned' or 'crew shaken' results the target is suffering from - but destroyed weapons cannot be fired.
descriptions.name: Mind It The Machine

descriptions.description: Unlimited range, S:10 AP:1, Assault 1, One shot
descriptions.name: Tachyon Arrow

descriptions.description: Trazyn is a scoring unit and can claim objectives.
descriptions.name: Excellent! Another Piece For The Collection
descriptions.smallDesc: Excellent! Another Piece For The Collection

descriptions.description: If Trazyn is removed from play as a casualty, roll a D6. On a roll of 2+, randomly choose another model from all friendly Lychguards, Crypteks, Necron Lords and Overlords on the Table (Excluding Special Characters). Remove the nominated model from play as a casualty and return Trazyn to play in its place - his remaining Wounds are now equal to the number of Wounds the removed model had menaining.
descriptions.name: Surrogate Hosts

descriptions.description: If Trazyn kills one or more enemies in close combat, the Empathic Obliterator unleashes a psionic shockwave. This occurs after all blows have been struck, but before the Assault Results are determined.; ; Roll a D6 for every model in the combat (friendly and enemy) with exactly the same name on their characteristic profile as a model slain by Trazyn that phase. If the score is 4+, that model suffers a Wound.; Wounds caused by this manner count towards the Assault Result.
descriptions.name: Empathic Obliterator

descriptions.description: At the start of the Fight sub-phase, randomly select an enemy model in base contact with the bearer. . That model take Leadership test on 3D6. If it fails - the model inflicts D3 hits on his own unt instead of normal attack. These hits are resolved at the victim's Strength and benefit from any abilities and penalties from his close combat weapons. If he is still alive, the victim returns to normal at the end of the round
descriptions.name: Mindshackle Scarabs

descriptions.description: (Basic Power Sword); S:U AP:3, Melee
descriptions.name: Hyperphase sword

descriptions.description: Close combat weapon with Rending and Entropic Strike special rules; Entropic strike - any model that suffers one or more unsaved Wounds from this weapon, immediately loses its armour save for the remainder of the battle. For each hit a vehicle suffers from a weapon or model with this special rule, roll a D6. On a 4+, it immediately loses 1 point of AV from all facings. If a vehicle is reduced to Armour 0 an any facing, it is immediately wrecked.
descriptions.name: Voidblade

descriptions.description: One use only. The bearer may use this instead of making his normal close combat attacks. Choose a character or monstrous creature or flying monstrous creature in base contact. The victim must immediately roll equal to or under its remaining Wounds on a D6 or be removed as casualty
descriptions.name: Tesseract Labyrinth

descriptions.description: Preferred Enemy special rule
descriptions.name: Preferred Enemy

descriptions.description: Template S:8 AP:1, Assault 1, Shroud of Despair: Rolls to wound are made against target's Leadership instead of Toughness. Has no effect against vehicles
descriptions.name: Abyssal Stuff

descriptions.description: Can be used during Shooting phase instead of firing a weapon. Choose an unengaged enemy unit within 18&quot. That unit must immediately take a Morale check.
descriptions.name: Nightmare Shroud

descriptions.description: Can be used in the Movement phase instead of moving normally. The Cryptek and his unit are removed from the tabletop and immediately Deep Strike back onto the battlefield. This cannot be used if the Cryptek or his unit are locked in combat
descriptions.name: Veil Of Darkness

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:8 AP:2, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Eldritch Lance

descriptions.description: One use only. Can be used at the start of any turn. If the Night Fighting rules are in effect, the cease to apply untill the end of the turn. If the Night Fihting rules are not in effect, then the apply until the end of the turn.
descriptions.name: Solar Pulse

descriptions.description: Close combat weapon. Any enemy that suffers an unsaved Wound from an aeonstave loses the Fleet special rule, and has his WS, BS, In and At valused reduced to 1 for the remainder of the game.
descriptions.name: Aeonstave

descriptions.description: Cryptek or one model in his unit can re-roll a single D6 roll per each phase
descriptions.name: Chronometron

descriptions.description: 3+ Invulnerable Save
descriptions.name: Timesplinter cloak

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:5 AP:-, Assault 4, Haywire: Inflicts a single glancing hit in a penetration roll of 2-5 or penetrating hit on a roll of 6
descriptions.name: Voltaic Staff

descriptions.description: When an enemy unit successfully moves into assault with the Cryptek (or his unit), the assaulting unit immediately suffers D6 S:8 AP:5 hits.
descriptions.name: Lightning Field

descriptions.description: Any enemy unit arriving by Deep Strike within 6&quot of the bearer suffers D6 S:8 AP:5 hits. If an enemy unit arrives by Deep Strike within range of one or more ether crystals, then increase the number of hits by one for each ether crystal beyond first
descriptions.name: Ether Crystal

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:4 AP:- Assault 1, Blast, Quake: All enemy units treat open ground as difficult terrain during their next Movement phase.
descriptions.name: Tremorstave

descriptions.description: At the start of the enemy Assault phase, roll a D3 and nominate an enemy unit. If this unit attempts to assault the Cryptek, or his unit, reduce their charge distance by the result of the D3 for that phase.
descriptions.name: Seismic Crucible

descriptions.description: Unlimited range S:6 AP:-, Assault 1, Entropic strike - any model that suffers one or more unsaved Wounds from this weapon, immediately loses its armour save for the remainder of the battle. For each hit a vehicle suffers from a weapon or model with this special rule, roll a D6. On a 4+, it immediately loses 1 point of AV from all facings. If a vehicle is reduced to Armour 0 an any facing, it is immediately wrecked.
descriptions.name: Harp Of Dissonance

descriptions.description: Ghost Ark
descriptions.name: Ghost Ark

descriptions.description: Night Scythe
descriptions.name: Night Scythe

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:4 AP:5, Rapid Fire, Gauss
descriptions.name: Gauss Flayer

descriptions.description: At the start of each Necron Movement phase, can try to repair a unit of Necron Warriors within 6&quot (or embarked on). On a D6 roll of 2+, add D3 models to the unit - this models can move and act normally this turn. This cannot take the unit beyond its starting size. On the roll of 1, the repair comes successfully, however the Ghist Ark suffers a single glancing hit with no save allowed.
descriptions.name: Repair Barge

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:7 AP:-, Assault 4, Tesla, Twin-linked, Arc; Arc - Roll D6 for each other unit (friend or foe) within 6&quot. On a roll of 6 this unit suffers additional D6 S:5 AP:- hits
descriptions.name: Twin-linked Tesla Destructor

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:5 AP:-, Assault 1, Tesla
descriptions.name: Tesla Carbines

descriptions.description: Immediately after an enemy unit arrives from reserve, any Deathmark units in Deep Strike reserve that have not yet entered play can themselves choose to enter play via Deep Strike, usually in the enemy turn. Any Deathmark units that choose not to enter play in this fashion make reserve rolls as normal in subsequent turns.
descriptions.name: Ethereal Interception

descriptions.description: When a Deathmark unit deploys, choose a non-vehicle enemy unit on the battlefield (even a unit in transport) to be their prey. Any Deathmark unit that shoots at, or strikes blows against a unit, marked in this fashion will score a Wound on a roll of 2+
descriptions.name: Hunters From Hyperspace

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:X AP:5, Rapid Fire, Sniper
descriptions.name: Synaptic Disintegrator

descriptions.description: 4+ Invulnerable save; If the save is made against a shooting attack, choose an unengaged enemy unit within 6&quot - that unit suffers a single hit with Strength and AP equal to that of the initial shot. You may not deflect attacks from template and blast weapons
descriptions.name: Hyperphase Sword And Dispersion Shield

descriptions.description: S:+1 AP:2, Melee, Unwieldy ; 6&quot S:5 AP:2, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Rod Of Covenant

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:6 AP:5, Pistol
descriptions.name: Voidblade And Particle Caster

descriptions.description: Particle Caster
descriptions.name: Particle Caster

descriptions.description: Entropic strike - any model that suffers one or more unsaved Wounds from this weapon, immediately loses its armour save for the remainder of the battle. For each hit a vehicle suffers from a weapon or model with this special rule, roll a D6. On a 4+, it immediately loses 1 point of AV from all facings. If a vehicle is reduced to Armour 0 an any facing, it is immediately wrecked.
descriptions.name: Entropic Touch

descriptions.description: All flamer weapons (from W:40k Rulebook), weapons with Melta special rule, and weapons described as using 'fire' or 'flame' as its effect or its special rules, are fired within 12&quot of the C'tan Shard have a chance of exploding. Roll a D6 each time such a weapon is fired within range. On a roll of a 1, the weapon detonates. If carried by a non-vehicle model, the model is removed from play as a casualty. If mounted on a vehicle, it counts as a weapon destroyed result, and the vehicle loses a Hull Point. In either case, the shot(s) are lost.
descriptions.name: Lord Of Fire

descriptions.description: 18&quot S:4 AP:-, Assault 8
descriptions.name: Pyreshards

descriptions.description: C'tan is treated as having assault and defensive grenades. Futhersome it has Stealth special rule.
descriptions.name: Swarm Of Spirit Dust

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:4 AP:-, Assault 1, Large Blast
descriptions.name: Moulder Of Worlds

descriptions.description: All enemy vehicles moving within 6&quot count any terrain as dangerous. Any enemy units deepstriking within 6&quot automatically suffer a Deep Strike mushap if their scatter roll is a double (whether or not a hit was rolled)
descriptions.name: Sentient Singularity

descriptions.description: Whilst the C'tan Shard is on the battlefield, any Difficult terrain is also count as Dangerous
descriptions.name: Writhing Worldscape

descriptions.description: After all Scout moves, you may immediately redeploy D3 friendly units, subject to the normal deployment rules for the mission. This can be used to move units into or out of reserve.
descriptions.name: Grand Illusion

descriptions.description: At the start of the Fight sub-phase, before blows are struck, nominate one enemy model in base contact. That model must pass an Initiative test or be removed as a casualty with no saves of any kind allowed.
descriptions.name: Time's Arrow

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:9 AP:2, Assault 1
descriptions.name: Transdimensional Thunderbolt

descriptions.description: In the Assault phase, after all other blows in the C'tan Shard's combat have been struck, centre the large blast marker on the C'tan Shard. All other model beneath the marker (friend or foe) suffer a S:3 hit with no armour save allowed. If the C'tan Shard causes one or more unsaved Wounds in this manner, it regains one Wound lost earlier in the battle. These Wounds do not count towards combat resolution.
descriptions.name: Gaze Of Death

descriptions.description: If a Triarch Stalker shoots at an enemy unit and manages at least one hit, all other friendly nits that shoot at the same target later in the same Shooting phase count their weapons as twin-linked
descriptions.name: Targeting Relay

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:8 AP:1, Heavy 2, Melta ; or ; Template S:5 AP:4, Heavy 1
descriptions.name: Heat Ray

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:7 AP:4, Heavy 1, Large Blast
descriptions.name: Particle Shredder

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:9 AP:2, Assault 1, Gauss, Twin-linked
descriptions.name: Twin-linked Heavy Guess Cannon

descriptions.description: Close combate attacks are Rending
descriptions.name: Phase Attacks

descriptions.description: Never slowed by Difficult Terrain, and automatically pass Dangerous Terrain tests.
descriptions.name: Wraithflight

descriptions.description: All enemies in base contact count their Initiative value as 1
descriptions.name: Whip Coils

descriptions.description: Any model that suffers one or more unsaved Wounds from this weapon, immediately loses its armour save for the remainder of the battle. For each hit a vehicle suffers from a weapon or model with this special rule, roll a D6. On a 4+, it immediately loses 1 point of AV from all facings. If a vehicle is reduced to Armour 0 an any facing, it is immediately wrecked.
descriptions.name: Entropic Strike

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:5 AP:-, Assault 1, Tesla, Twin-linked
descriptions.name: Twin-linked Tesla Carbine

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:5 AP:4, Rapid Fire, Gauss, Twin-linked
descriptions.name: Twin-linked Gauss Blaster

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:6 AP:5, Heavy 1, Blast
descriptions.name: Particle Beamer

descriptions.description: BS 5
descriptions.name: Nebuloscopes

descriptions.description: Provides Stealth
descriptions.name: Shadowlooms

descriptions.description: 3+ Armour Save
descriptions.name: Shield Vanes

descriptions.description: 36&quot S:9 AP:2, Assault 1, Gauss
descriptions.name: Heavy Gauss Cannon

descriptions.description: Stationary: 72&quot S:9 AP:1, Heavy 1, Large Blast; Combat Speed: 24&quot S:7 AP:4, Heavy 1, Blast
descriptions.name: Doomsday Cannon

descriptions.description: Each array counts as 5 seperate Gauss Flayers. The two arrays can shoot at different targets, although all guns in the same array must shoot at the same target.; 24&quot S:4 AP:5, Rapid Fire (x5), Gauss
descriptions.name: Gauss Flayer Array

descriptions.description: At the start of Movement phase (or after Deep Strike), choose one friendly unengaged non-vehicle Necron unit on the battle field or in reserve. That unit immediately phases out from current position and disembarks from portal as from vehicle moving at combat speed; ; May also be used as shooting weapon:; D6&quot S:X AP:-, Heavy 1, Special:; All enemy models within range and LOS must immediately pass a Strength test (models without St characteristic automatically pass) or be removed as casualty. Roll seperately for each model hit
descriptions.name: Eternity Gate

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:4 AP:5, Heavy 3, Gauss, Can be fired at a different target to other weapons
descriptions.name: Gauss Flux Arc

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:8 AP:3, Ordnance 1, Large Blast
descriptions.name: Particle Whip

descriptions.description: 12&quot S:10 AP:1, Heavy 1; Nominate a point within 12&quot and a second one within 3D6&quot of the first. All units suffer a number of hits equal to the number of models in the unit underneath the line
descriptions.name: Death Ray

descriptions.description: At the start of each Necron Movement phase a Spyder that is not locked in close combat may try to create a Scarab Swarm; ; Nominate s Canoptek Scarab unit within 6 and roll a D6. On 2+ add one base to to the Canopter Scarab unit. This can take the unit beyond its starting size. On a roll of 1, the base is still placed, however, the Canoptek Spyder suffers a Wound with no armour or cover saves allowed.
descriptions.name: Scarab Hive

descriptions.description: Close combat weapon. In addition may try to repair damaged vehicle instead of shooting attack. Select a vehicle in base contact and roll a D6. On a roll of 4+ either restore a Hull Point or a single Weapon Destroyed or Immobilised result. Cannot repair if gone to ground
descriptions.name: Fabricator Claw Array

descriptions.description: On a roll of 4+ nullify enemy psychic power targeted on a Spyder or any friendly within 3&quot of Spyder.
descriptions.name: Gloom Prism

descriptions.description: 24&quot S:6 AP:5, Heavy 1, Blast
descriptions.name: Twin-linked Particle Beamer

descriptions.description: Raider
descriptions.name: Raider

descriptions.description: Venom
descriptions.name: Venom

descriptions.description: Klaive
descriptions.name: Klaive

descriptions.description: Dracon
descriptions.name: Dracon

descriptions.description: Carnifex
descriptions.name: Carnifex

descriptions.description: Servitors
descriptions.name: Servitors

descriptions.description: inv. save 5+
descriptions.name: Power Field

descriptions.description: Crusader
descriptions.name: Crusader

descriptions.description: Land Speeder Storm
descriptions.name: Land Speeder Storm

descriptions.description: Colonel 'Iron Hand' Straken
descriptions.name: Colonel 'Iron Hand' Straken

descriptions.description: Veteran Weapons Team
descriptions.name: Veteran Weapons Team

descriptions.name: Master Of Ordinance
